member.name: P:Global.LettersMap
member.summary: Modify the MapLetters subroutine to convert variable names written with your langaye letters to English ones. Any letter that is not mapped will used as it is in the translated code

member.name: P:Global.Ops
member.summary: `Ops` is an array that works as a dynamic object. Use `!` to add properties to this object or to read them.

member.name: P:Global.Tokens
member.summary: Tokens array for the current line

member.name: P:Global.Vars
member.summary: Array containing variables of current proogram
